item.title: October 6, 2025, at 1:35:04 PM
item.description: I’ve experimented with other apps that could potentially replace Drafts. I’m not sure about my motivation for doing that. However, what I’ve concluded is that all the automations I’ve created and rely on in Drafts can’t be easily replicated, if at all, in apps like MarkEdit, iA Writer, Bear, etc.
